abstract: The New York Senate passed a bill to repeal a new policy that forces online merchants like Amazon.com to collect sales tax on shipments to state residents. The state Assembly and Governor Paterson, however, are not likely to give up tax revenue in the face of a budget crisis.
snippet: The New York Senate passed a bill to repeal a new policy that forces online merchants like Amazon.com to collect sales tax on shipments to state residents. The state Assembly and Governor Paterson, however, are not likely to give up tax revenue in...
lead_paragraph: Is New York State changing its mind about requiring online stores to collect sales tax on purchases made by state residents?

headline.main: New York Senate Teases Amazon Customers With Sales Tax Repeal

abstract: Do digital songs from Amazon.com work on an iPod, and if so, how do you get them onto the thing from the Web?
